name: Minigame Munchies
description:
Step on up to the most delicious minigames in the world! Catch candies, avoid giant popsicles, and save poor gummy bears from imminent death in this minigame extravaganza!

Warning:Press Fullscreen Button before playing

Special Thanks to-

NotEuclid for convincing me to do this jam after I lost a day to a failed idea

My brother for making six songs for this game.

Master484 for making most of the the art that I used(https://opengameart.org/content/super-candy-set-m484-games).

Freesound.org for all of the sounds.
